entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
